title: Stage Lv10-S23
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Overall, I think it's pretty decent.
Taking everything into account, I'd call it a success.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 전체적으로 봤을 때, 꽤 괜찮은 것 같아.
sentences.en: Overall, I think it's pretty decent.
Taking everything into account, I'd call it a success.

sentences.kr: 다 고려해봐도, 이게 최선의 선택인 것 같아.
sentences.en: Even considering everything, this seems like the best choice.
When I weigh everything up, I'm satisfied.

sentences.kr: 좋은 점, 나쁜 점 다 있지만, 결국 괜찮아.
sentences.en: There are pros and cons, but ultimately it's fine.
It's not perfect, but it's good on the whole.
Thinking about this and that, it's not bad at all.
Now that it's all wrapped up, it turned out better than expected.
